channel.title: Single & Salami
channel.description:
Here's a quick mockumentary I made about a student who is obsessed with salami... :wink:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=biyR3khX0dE'][b][u][color=lime]Single & Salami[/size][/u][/b][/url]

item.title: Single & Salami
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Funny enough. Definitely could have been less minimalistic about it.
People can chuckle at the weirdos on My Strange Addiction and Obsessed and Hoarders because they’ve got more than one fucked up trait to their condition.

The boy in the video here keeps a straight face, doesn’t interact with anyone besides the cameramen.
His salami fetish is funny but the execution is fatally subtle.
Subtlety is rare among humorous items and this normally goes hand in hand with rapid fire gags that you have to trust the audience to notice.
You’ve dragged one good idea out for 7.5 minutes. Someone with an idea of timing and flavor could have done it right but the thing i just watched felt like a bucket of sludge that wasn’t lame enough to suck, but not substantial enough to laugh about and show my friends.

I liked the video and I’ll remember a few items of it for perhaps a decade, if not five. The forum was my favorite bit.

Read full topic
